A soap dispenser that dispenses soap in the shape of a lotus flower, adding a touch of elegance to any bathroom sink.
A soap dispenser that dispenses soap in different scents based on the time of day, creating a personalized experience for users.
A soap dispenser that uses solar energy to power its dispensing mechanism, reducing the environmental impact of soap usage.
A soap dispenser that uses voice recognition technology to dispense soap, allowing users to simply say "hello" to their soap dispenser and receive a dispense.
A soap dispenser that uses biodegradable soap and has a built-in filtration system, ensuring that the soap is always clean and free of harmful chemicals.
